name: ChecktheSyllabus
0:
”Alexa open check the syllabus”
”Check the syllabus”
”Alexa, check the syllabus”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check the syllabus
des: Check the syllabus is an open source, free, Alexa skill that gathers no user data. In a nutshell check the syllabus offers instructor a low friction way of integrating smart speaker technology in their class. For students, it offers a hassle free solution for keeping track of what is due and when.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
